Experience Partner Marketing Specialist Intel Corporation January 2014  – Present (1 year 8 months) Gdansk, Pomeranian District, Poland Market Development Fund (MDF) Program is an Intel sales program designed to drive targeted co-marketing with OEMs to increase sales.  
 
As a Partner Marketing Specialist focused on MDF, my key responsibilities include:  
- managing MDF investments to ensure compliancy with Intel's general and account specific guidelines 
- providing direction on MDF budgets, processes and guidelines to Intel EMEA sales force 
- influencing investment decisions across entire EMEA region to align business and marketing objectives of Intel and Original Equipment Manufacturers 
- close cooperation with major multinational accounts: Asus, HP (Server), Toshiba, Samsung, Bull 
- collaboration with Sales, Marketing, Finance and Legal teams on regional and worldwide level to ensure proper execution of MDF activities in EMEA 
- delivering regular customer and internal sales force trainings on Intel partner programs on country and regional level 
- driving efforts towards integration of key funding programs at Intel 
- implementation of advanced programmatic tools to increase efficiency and transparency of Intel partner investments Marketing Training Specialist Intel Corporation August 2012  –  December 2013  (1 year 5 months) Warsaw, Masovian District, Poland Scope of responsibilities: 
organisation of product trainings for the EMEA SMG audiences, from contacting presenters to planning the training calendar, to managing virtual training platform, to promotion, communication and interaction with the audience. 
 
Greatest Achievements: 
-	successful transformation of the way product trainings are communicated – from one way messaging to interactive promotion using multiple vehicles. 
-	Significant time and cost savings thanks to successful transition to the new bridge solution Legal Personal Assistant Allen & Overy July 2010  –  July 2012  (2 years 1 month) Warsaw, Masovian District, Poland Scope of responsibilities: 
preparation and edition of documents, cooperation with the marketing department, organisation of meetings, contact with clients Marketing Department Intern URS Corporation July 2010  –  November 2010  (5 months) Warsaw, Masovian District, Poland Scope of responsibilities: 
coordination of project documentation (client references, project descriptions), preparation and coordination of project database, creating and administering projects’ websites, Polish-English translations, preparation of newsletter articles.
